text: Þis his þare X hida boc be wilig þe Eadmund cing gebocade Ordwolde his þægne on eche yrfe.
Þis syndan þa landgemæro æt Wilig.
Ærest of Wilig staþe up andlang maerfyrh on þane wonhlinc.
Of þæm hlince to wege.
Andlang weges to mærhlince.
Andlang mærhlinches to stancumbe.
Þonen andlang stancumbes.
Of stancumbe up ofer þa eorþburg.
Fram þære eorþburg to wulfflodan.
Þonen ændlang þare dic from wulfflodan to teofuntinga gemære þonne andlang þare dic oþ sidan hamme on þare hina gemære on ðone stanhlinc.
Þonne of stanhlince wiþ westan hæþslæd.
Þonne of hæþslæde on billan dene on þone mærhlinc þonne andlang mærhlinces oþ þara þreora æcera heafod þonne eft be þare þreora æcera heafdum on oþerne mærhlinc.
Þonne andlang þæs mærhlinces oþþe wellbærninge &lang weges oþ þæt hit cumþ to þam herpaþe.

Þonne ofer ðone herpaþ & niþer ofer þone mersc þæt hit cumþ on wilig stæþ þonne niþer &lang stremes on butan þone horsgærstun þæt hit sticað on þære ea sulfre þonne andlang ea oþ þat hit cumþ to þam eastlandgemære æt mærfurh þæt hit ær onfeng.
And þis is þæt landgemære æt brembelcumbe æt þam wicum þe into wilig hurþ.
Ærest æt punteles treowe.
Þonne &lang weges þæt ofer tilmannes dene.
Þonne forð be þam urþlonde þæt hit sticaþ on æþerices gemære on þam wege.
Þonne andlang weges þæt hit sticaþ on hunan wege.
Þonne &lang hunan weges þat hit cumþ to mærdic.
Þonne &lang mærdic þat eft to punteles treowe.
And se mæd æt dutten hamme hurþ into wilig & se hage æt wiltune þe hurþ into wilig & þæs tunes heges bot on grafan lea &<../images/tbar.gif>þridde treow on monnes pol bære.
Þis hurþ eal in to wilig to Ordwaldes tune.
